_source.text: 1 box chocolate fudge cake mix (I used SuperMoist's Triple Chocolate Fudge, but any chocolate kind with pudding in it works - the fudge is definitely better than Devil's Food, promise!)

text: with pudding in **it** **works** - the fudge is definitely **better** **than** Devil's Food, **promise**!)

_source.text: 1) It tastes awful (sure does) 2) It works (better than anything else on the market) So, ignore the ads if they annoy you; just try the product.

text: 1) It tastes awful (sure does) 2) **It** **works** (**better** **than** anything else on **the** **market**) So, ignore the ads if they annoy you; just try the product.

_source.text: A correspondent said that, notwithstanding President Bush's promise of $5 billion, it seemed that the dominant United States position was that trade was better than aid, and an unseen, but all-seeing, hand of the market would cure all ills.

text: the dominant United States position was that trade was **better** **than** aid, and an unseen, but all-seeing, hand of **the** **market** would cure all ills.
